name: Propaya
headline: AI commercial lease abstractions and review
description: Propaya uses AI to automate commercial lease abstractions and reviews. Propaya customers save 90% of lease review processing time and cost compared to before.

founders.name: Reader Wang, Founder
founders.description: Reader, CEO of Propaya,  a former SpaceX engineer in the Starship Program with an MS from Stanford and a BS from the University of Michigan. Still actively managing over 70 rental properties for his family, Reader understands the firsthand pain points of property management.

founders.name: Jake Golas, Founder
founders.description: Jake, CTO of Propaya, a former full-stack software developer at Epic Systems, completed his BS in Computer Science in just three 1/2 years.

# Your due diligence process, now in minutes
Save 85% or more on lease review, guaranteed.
[Book a Demo](https://www.propaya.com/<https:/calendly.com/reader-propaya/30min>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/674e8ee621e12ef7200590ea_BlueGradientModernYoutubeIntro-ezgif.com-optimize.gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)
## Lease Review Within Minutes
With Propaya's AI powered lease extractor, you can automate the entire process, expediting your workflow. Simply scan or upload a lease, and within minutes you'll have a detailed breakdown of all relevant details ready to download.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba387e_icon%201.svg)
##### Fully Automated
Save time through the power of automation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba387d_icon%202.svg)
##### Security
Ensure the highest of security for your leases in our system.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3886_icon%203.svg)
##### High Accuracy
Reduce manual errors.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3878_icon%204.svg)
##### Export to Excel
Easily export your needed form.
## A custom solution tailored to your needs
With our experience in real estate, we understand the challenges that each company faces are unique. Our software developers work closely with our industry experts to create custom made solutions specifically with your needs in mind. Find out how Propaya can maximize your growth potential today.
[Our Features](https://www.propaya.com/</features>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ebd4f57e8c25888ae8f81_compass-2779371_1920-1-1867x960.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ebd4e6d7aa569236de200_istockphoto-596803988-612x612.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ebd4f88e48a72ce29bbb5_shutterstock_242137633.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)
## How it works
1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3885_icon%206.svg)
#### Upload a lease document
Either upload, scan or drag in your lease file.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba388a_arrow%201.svg)
2
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3881_icon%208.svg)
#### And get an analysis instantly
Within minutes our AI powered software will analyze your lease.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba388b_arrow%202.svg)
3
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3880_icon%205.svg)
#### Available for export to spreadsheets
Export the information you need in the form you want. 
[Book a Demo](https://www.propaya.com/<https:/calendly.com/reader-propaya/30min>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3876_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3877_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ebd4f26a9ebed037e8605_1605392099805.jpeg)
## Due Diligence with industry experts
Our software is developed by an experienced team of developers and commercial real estate professionals from around the world. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba389d_check%20orange.svg)
###### Industry knowledge
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba389d_check%20orange.svg)
###### Cutting-edge capabilities
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673ea082bd36163cc4ba3819/673ea082bd36163cc4ba389d_check%20orange.svg)
###### Faster due diligence process
## Simplify your process with Propaya
Leave your information below, and we'll get in contact.

generated_description:
**Propaya: Redefining Commercial Lease Review with AI**

Founded in 2024, Propaya is shaking up the commercial real estate industry by leveraging artificial intelligence to automate lease abstractions and reviews. Based in San Francisco and part of the Y Combinator Batch S24, this startup has a simple yet powerful mission: to streamline the due diligence process for real estate professionals and businesses alike.

**What Does Propaya Do?**  
At its core, Propaya helps its customers save a staggering 90% of lease review processing time and cost. Using their AI-powered lease extractor, users can upload or scan lease documents, and within just minutes, they receive a detailed analysis. This is game-changing for professionals who traditionally faced lengthy, manual review processes. The software guarantees high accuracy, strong security, and customizability, making it an invaluable tool for real estate firms looking to improve their workflows.

**Why Propaya Matters**  
Real estate transactions often involve complex legal documents, and navigating these can be daunting. With Propaya, organizations can expedite workflows, reduce manual errors, and enhance overall productivity. The founders understand that each client's needs are unique, and they aim to provide tailored solutions that meet those specific challenges. 

**The Team and Backing**  
As a lean operation with just two employees and guidance from Y Combinator's Harj Taggar, Propaya is poised for growth. Their combination of industry expertise and cutting-edge technology positions them well to capture a slice of the blooming proptech market.

**Conclusion**  
As Propaya continues to grow, it aims to not only transform lease reviews but to redefine the entire approach to due diligence in commercial real estate. With efficiency, security, and accuracy at its forefront, it promises to be a true ally in the ever-evolving landscape of real estate transactions.

For more information, check out [Propaya's website](https://www.propaya.com).
